file.name: SystemDevelopment.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: System Development
  description: Develop new, enhance existing applications and integrate package based systems solutions
  version: 10.0.0
servers:
- description: SwaggerHub API Auto Mocking
  url: https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/BIAN-3/SystemDevelopment/10.0.0
paths:
  /SystemDevelopment/Create:
    post:
      tags:
      - CR - ITSystemDevelopment
      summary: CrCR Create/initiate a system development project
      description: CrCR Create/initiate a system development project
      operationId: Create
      parameters: []
      requestBody:
        $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/CreateITSystemDevelopmentRequest'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/CreateITSystemDevelopmentResponse'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /SystemDevelopment/{systemdevelopmentId}/Update:
    put:
      tags:
      - CR - ITSystemDevelopment
      summary: UpCR Update details of an active system development project

  /SystemDevelopment/{systemdevelopmentId}/Request:

components:
  schemas:
    ITSystemDevelopment:
      type: object
      properties:
        SystemDevelopmentProjectName:
          type: string
        SystemDevelopmentProjectType:
          type: string
        SystemDevelopmentProjectDescription:
          type: string
        SystemDevelopmentImplementationPlan:
          type: string
        SystemDevelopmentBudget:
          type: string
        SystemDevelopmentProjectOrganization:
          type: string
        SystemDevelopmentProjectSchedule:
          type: string
        DateType:
          type: string
        Date:
          type: string
    UsageSpecification:
      type: object
      properties:
        UsageSpecificationTaskDefinition:
          type: string
        UsageSpecificationTaskWorkProducts:
          type: string
        DocumentDirectoryEntryInstanceReference:
